extension.searchTitle: AMERICA'S SMALL BUSINESS TAX RELIEF ACT OF 2015; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 53

congVote.result: The amendment (No. 3512), as modified, was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: America's Small Business Tax Relief Act_Agreement
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate continued consideration of H.R. 636, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend increased expensing limitations, taking action on the following amendments proposed thereto:<P/>By 85 yeas to 10 nays (Vote No. 41), Thune Modified Amendment No. 3512 (to Amendment No. 3464), to enhance airport security.

congVote.result: The amendment (No. 3482), as modified, was agreed to.
